fields.description:
1. Add pause event for ImageView
2. Modify the default duration (when duration property is not set) to 200 ms.
3. Modify KS test Views -> Image Views -> Animated to reflect changes.

Testing steps:
1. Run Views -> Image Views -> Animated in Kitchen Sink and Kitchen-Sink Nook.
2. Click on pause button, you should see "ImageView animation paused" in log
fields.summary: Android: UI.ImageView - add pause event and change the default duration for animation
